001package io.github.ai4ci.output;
002
003import java.util.stream.Stream;
004
005import org.immutables.value.Value;
006
007import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Outbreak;
008import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.DuckDBWriter;
009import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.Export;
010import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.Export.Stage;
011
012/**
013 * Contact tracing records exported during simulation updates.
014 *
015 * <p>
016 * Main purpose: represent individual contact events detected or inferred during
017 * an update step of the simulation. Records are produced in the UPDATE stage
018 * and are exported per agent to a DuckDB database file
019 * ({@code contacts.duckdb}).
020 *
021 * <p>
022 * Downstream uses: consumed by contact tracing analyses, contact network
023 * statistics and any downstream exporters that require individual contact
024 * events for reconstruction or privacyâ€‘preserving analysis.
025 *
026 * @author Rob Challen
027 */
028@Value.Immutable
029
030@Export(
031                stage = Stage.UPDATE,
032                value = "contacts.duckdb",
033                size = 64 * 64,
034                selector = ContactCSV.Selector.class,
035                writer = DuckDBWriter.class
036)
037public interface ContactCSV extends CommonCSV.State {
038
039        /**
040         * Selector class implements Export.Selector to provide contact data
041         * extraction from Outbreak simulations. Transforms person data into contact
042         * records using CSVMapper for CSV serialization.
043         */
044        static class Selector implements Export.Selector {
045                @Override
046                public Stream<ContactCSV> apply(Outbreak o) {
047                        return o.getPeople().stream().flatMap(CSVMapper.INSTANCE::toContacts);
048                }
049        }
050
051        /**
052         * Get the unique identifier of the contacted person.
053         *
054         * @return the person id on the receiving end of the contact event
055         */
056        int getContactId();
057
058        /**
059         * Get the unique identifier of the person initiating the contact.
060         *
061         * @return the person id who initiated the contact; corresponds to the
062         *         {@code id} field of the source person record
063         */
064        int getId();
065
066        /**
067         * Whether the contact was detected through contact tracing.
068         *
069         * @return true if the contact was detected, false if it was not detected or
070         *         was a simulated/latent contact
071         */
072        boolean isDetected();
073
074}
